message: All CLI commands defined in src/certo/cli/__init__.py are documented in docs/cli.md. The main commands (init, status, claim, issue, check, scan, kb), global options (--version, --quiet, --verbose, --format, --path), and the kb update subcommand are all present in the documentation. While some subcommands are imported from other modules, the documentation comprehensively covers the expected subcommands for each command group.
